柛字的基本解释

柛
shēn
树木自死而倒下。

柛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shēn］
［《廣韻》失人切，平真，書。］
(1)树木自倒而死。
(2)枯死的树木。参见“柛”。

柛字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　柛； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页519第13
【唐韻】失人切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】升人切，?音申。【爾雅·釋木】木自斃曰柛。【廣韻】柛謂弊踣也。【容齋隨筆】木絕于申，故申字之訓爲自斃。

柛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
柛字的起名意思

暂无。

柛
Basic explanation of words
柛
shēn
The tree fell by its own death.
柛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shēn]
["Guangyun" is uncharacteristic, plain, book. ]
(1) The tree fell and died by itself.
(2) Dead trees. See "柛".
柛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　柛; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 519 13
[Tang Yun] Lost and cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Ascended and cut,? Yin Shen. 【Erya·Shimu】Mu died of death, called Zhao. [Guang Yun] Zhao said that it is a disadvantage. [Rong Zhai's essays] Mu Jue Yu Shen, so the precepts of Shen Zi are self-destructive.
